Package index

Overview Page

random.cdisc.data random.cdisc.data-package
random.cdisc.data Package

CDISC Domain Functions

These functions generate CDISC domains containing randomly assigned data.

radae() stable
Adverse Event Analysis Dataset (ADAE)
radab() stable
Anti-Drug Antibody Analysis Dataset (ADAB)
radaette() stable
Time to Adverse Event Analysis Dataset (ADAETTE)
radcm() stable
Previous and Concomitant Medications Analysis Dataset (ADCM)
raddv() stable
Protocol Deviations Analysis Dataset (ADDV)
radeg() stable
ECG Analysis Dataset (ADEG)
radex() stable
Exposure Analysis Dataset (ADEX)
radhy() stable
Hy's Law Analysis Dataset (ADHY)
radlb() stable
Laboratory Data Analysis Dataset (ADLB)
radmh() stable
Medical History Analysis Dataset (ADMH)
radpc() stable
Pharmacokinetics Analysis Dataset (ADPC)
radpp() stable
Pharmacokinetics Parameters Dataset (ADPP)
radqlqc() stable
EORTC QLQ-C30 V3 Analysis Dataset (ADQLQC)
radqs() stable
Questionnaires Analysis Dataset (ADQS)
radrs() stable
Tumor Response Analysis Dataset (ADRS)
radsaftte()
Time to Safety Event Analysis Dataset (ADSAFTTE)
radsl() stable
Subject-Level Analysis Dataset (ADSL)
radsub() stable
Subcategory Analysis Dataset (ADSUB)
radtr() stable
Tumor Response Analysis Dataset (ADTR)
radtte() stable
Time-to-Event Analysis Dataset (ADTTE)
radvs() stable
Vital Signs Analysis Dataset (ADVS)

Cached Datasets

These datasets are attached in order speed up the example sections of the dependent packages. Note you can also use the cached option in the corresponding r* functions to retrieve these cached datasets.

cadae
Cached ADAE
cadab
Cached ADAB
cadaette
Cached ADAETTE
cadcm
Cached ADCM
caddv
Cached ADDV
cadeg
Cached ADEG
cadex
Cached ADEX
cadhy
Cached ADHY
cadlb
Cached ADLB
cadmh
Cached ADMH
cadpc
Cached ADPC
cadpp
Cached ADPP
cadqlqc
Cached ADQLQC
cadqs
Cached ADQS
cadrs
Cached ADRS
cadsl
Cached ADSL
cadsub
Cached ADSUB
cadtr
Cached ADTR
cadtte
Cached ADTTE
cadvs
Cached ADVS

Utility Functions

These functions are not exported but are documented for developers.

apply_metadata()
Apply Metadata
get_qs_data() get_random_dates_between() prep_adqlqc() calc_scales() derv_chgcat1() comp_derv()
Helper Functions for Constructing ADQLQC
h_anthropometrics_by_sex()
Generate Anthropometric Measurements for Males and Females.
mutate_na() stable
Replace Values with NA
rel_var()
Related Variables: Assign
relvar_init()
Related Variables: Initialize
replace_na() stable
Replace Values in a Vector by NA
retain()
Primary Keys: Retain Values
rtexp() stable
Truncated Exponential Distribution
rtpois() stable
Zero-Truncated Poisson Distribution
sample_fct()
Create a Factor with Random Elements of x
rcd_var_relabel()
Primary Keys: Labels
visit_schedule()
Create Visit Schedule

On this page

random.cdisc.data is a part of the NEST and pharmaverse.
